title: Australian Open Day 2 live updates, schedules, highlights
description: After rain interrupted the opening day of the 2025 Australian Open, the weather looks more favourable for Day 2, and there are stars in action everywhere.
author: ESPN staff
excerpt: After rain interrupted the opening day of the 2025 Australian Open, the weather looks more favourable for Day 2, and there are stars in action everywhere.
text: Zheng Qinwen wins first-round matchup in straight sets (0:34)Zheng Qinwen moves on in the Australian Open after a straight-sets win against Anca Todoni. (0:34)ESPN staffJan 12, 2025, 06:30 PM ETAfter rain interrupted the opening day of the 2025 Australian Open, the weather looks more favourable for Day 2.American No. 1 Coco Gauff gets her campaign underway on Rod Laver Arena, as does reigning men's champion Jannik Sinner on what is a loaded Monday at Melbourne Park.Join our team on the ground as they bring you the latest news, weather, results, schedules and more.
html:
• ESPN staffJan 12, 2025, 06:30 PM ET

After rain interrupted the opening day of the 2025 Australian Open, the weather looks more favourable for Day 2.

American No. 1 Coco Gauff gets her campaign underway on Rod Laver Arena, as does reigning men's champion Jannik Sinner on what is a loaded Monday at Melbourne Park.

Join our team on the ground as they bring you the latest news, weather, results, schedules and more.
